travelRecommendations.title: Travel Recommendations
travelRecommendations.subtitle: Practical tips to prepare your East Africa adventure

tanzania.title: Tanzania
tanzania.intro: From Serengeti to Ngorongoro, these tips help you make the most.
tips: Best time for the Great Migration: June–October.
Pack neutral layers; nights can be chilly.
Tip guides and camp staff in cash (USD or TZS).
Sunscreen and repellent are essential year-round.

kenya.title: Kenya
kenya.intro: Classic African safari in Masai Mara and private conservancies.
tips: Book hot-air balloons early: limited seats.
Consider pairing Mara with Laikipia or Amboseli.
Cards work in luxury lodges, but carry some cash.

items.name: Emma & David
items.text: Every day felt like a dream — from the luxury camps to seeing the Big Five up close. The guides were outstanding!

items.name: Lucas M.
items.text: I never imagined I’d be this close to the migration. The entire trip was perfectly planned and stress-free.

items.name: Sophie & Claire
items.text: The mix of safari adventure and relaxing beaches was exactly what we needed. Highly recommend BigFiveTrails!

hero.title: Let's Plan Your Safari Adventure
hero.subtitle: Get in touch with our Tanzania experts. We're here to craft your perfect safari experience with personalized attention and local expertise.

form.title: Tell Us About Your Dream Safari
form.description: Share your travel preferences and we'll create a custom itinerary just for you. All inquiries receive a response within 24 hours.
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your travel style, interests, special requirements, or any questions you have...

q1.question: How quickly will I receive a response?
q1.answer: We respond to all inquiries within 24 hours, often much sooner. For urgent requests, you can call us directly or use WhatsApp for immediate assistance.

q2.question: What information do you need to plan my safari?
q2.answer: We'll need your preferred travel dates, number of travelers, budget range, and any specific interests or requirements. The more details you provide, the better we can customize your experience.

q3.question: Are your safaris suitable for families with children?
q3.answer: Absolutely! We offer family-friendly safaris with age-appropriate activities. Many of our lodges and camps welcome children, and we can adjust itineraries to accommodate family needs.

q4.question: What safety measures do you have in place?
q4.answer: Your safety is our top priority. All our vehicles are regularly maintained, guides are certified in first aid, and we follow strict COVID-19 protocols. We're also fully insured and licensed by TALA.
